email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per ton? The demurrage rate would be $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.00 per ton is acceptable, provided we can lock in the laycan of 15-20 October. Can you confirm the vessel’s availability for those dates? Also, please confirm the demurrage terms. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.00 works for you. I’ve confirmed with the owner, and the MV Ocean Star is available for the 15-20 October laycan. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata, as previously mentioned. Shall we proceed with drafting the charter party? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, yes, let’s proceed with the charter party. Please send over the draft for review. Also, could you confirm the cargo size is 140,000 MT and the incoterms are CFR Rotterdam? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ll send the draft charter party shortly. Yes, the cargo size is 140,000 MT, and the incoterms are CFR Rotterdam. I’ll include all the agreed terms in the draft. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
